DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Asia. The trial is designed to compare the effect on glycaemic control of liraglutide or glimepiride added to metformin in subjects with type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Liraglutide or Glimepiride Added to Metformin on Blood Glucose Control in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Subjects diagnosed with type 2 diabetes and treated with one or more oral antidiabetic drugs (OADs) for the last 3 months HbA1c: 7.011.0% (both incl.) for subjects on OAD alone HbA1c: 7.010.0 % (both incl.) for subjects on OAD combination therapy BMI less than 45.0 kg/m^2 Treatment with insulin within the last 3 months prior to the trial Impaired liver or/and renal function Significant cardiovascular disease over the last 6 months Known retinopathy or maculopathy Recurrent major hypoglycaemia or hypoglycaemic unawareness
